implementation_output.changes_summary: Implemented async_list and async_status MCP tools with comprehensive test coverage. async_list provides directory listing with glob filtering, recursive traversal, and optional hash attachment. async_status provides global server status and per-file lock/hash status. Both tools follow established patterns with PathValidator, LockManager, and HashRegistry integration. All 25 tests pass.

results.details: All 13 test cases pass covering basic listing, glob filtering, recursive traversal, hash attachment, and error conditions
All 12 test cases pass covering global status, per-file status, lock states, hash tracking, and error conditions
